title: BlackRock’s HPS Plots New ‘H Series’ Private Funds for Retail
description: BlackRock Inc. is planning to roll out a series of new private markets funds for retail investors following its $12 billion acquisition of credit specialist HPS Investment Partners.
content: BlackRock Inc. is planning to roll out a series of new private markets funds for retail investors following its $12 billion acquisition of credit specialist HPS Investment Partners.
